MS MCQs

    Display collections in Xamarin.Forms apps by using ListView - Dynamically add and remove ListView items

    »

    1. How do you dynamically add a new item to a ListView control?

      Add the new item directly to the ListView control by using a built-in Add method.

      Add the new item to the collection that was assigned to the ItemsSource property.

      Use the ContentPage instance’s built-in Add method.


    2. Which interface does ObservableCollection implement?

      INotifyPropertyChanged

      INotifyDataChanged

      INotifyCollectionChanged
